arts.ttl: Chelsea boss Maresca attempting to extend unusual 10-game streak in Wolves Premier League game
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca will be attempting to extend an unusual 10-game streak when the Blues face Wolverhampton Wanderers in Saturday's Premier League fixture.

arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend predictions - Week 11
arts.sum: There are five games taking place on Saturday and Sunday this week and Tom Hill predicts the outcome of all the matches before the next international break.

arts.ttl: Chelsea boss defends decisions ahead of Wolves clash
arts.sum: It’s impossible to play with the same players 65 games in one season. Ahead of Chelsea’s meeting with managerless Wolves on Saturday, Maresca stood by the decision to rest players and make full use of his squad, and pointed out that football has changed from the days when the former England and Manchester United forward played.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca confirms Chelsea team news for Wolves
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca says a decision over Pedro Neto's fitness will be made following today's training session at Cobham, but Blues midfielder Romeo Lavia is ruled out of tomorrow's Premier League clash against Wolverhampton Wanderers. With less than 72 hours between the final whistle against Qarabag and kick-off tomorrow evening, Maresca has several selection decisions to make.

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Wolves predictions: Estevao can steer Blues to victory
arts.sum: James Mason is expecting Estevao to play an important role for Chelsea in Saturday's Premier League clash against Wolves at Molineux.
